summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Enhanced Healthcare Risk Analytics Platform - all core features working excellently with 100% backend success and 95% frontend success
passed_tests: API Health Check - 200 OK response with proper API versioning
Dashboard Stats API - Returns all required KPIs (Total: 1000, High Risk: 62, Avg Risk: 0.420, Readmission: 33.4%)
Individual Patient Assessment API - Complete risk analysis with probability, category, factors, and recommendations
Chart Data APIs - All 5 chart types working (risk_by_diagnosis, age_distribution, risk_by_age_group, gender_risk, comorbidity_impact)
Model Metrics API - Returns best model (logistic_regression) and performance metrics for 3 models
Risk Assessment Workflow - Successfully tested low risk (0.01) and high risk (1.00) patient scenarios
Generate Sample Data - Successfully created 1000 patient healthcare records
Dataset Validation - Schema detection with target candidates and recommendations
Model Training - Trained 3 ML models (Logistic Regression, Random Forest, Gradient Boosting)
Risk Predictions - Generated predictions with proper Low/Medium/High segmentation (478/245/277)
Feature Importance - Retrieved feature rankings for model interpretability
Export Predictions - CSV export functionality working correctly
Dashboard KPI Cards - All 4 required cards displaying (Total Patients, High Risk, Avg Risk Score, Readmission Rate)
Patient Assessment Form - Complete form with Demographics, Clinical Info, Vitals & Labs, Risk Factors sections
Risk Gauge Visualization - Beautiful circular gauge showing risk percentage (9.3% for test patient)
Risk Category Display - Correctly shows Low/Medium/High risk with appropriate colors and badges
Key Risk Factors Panel - Displays important factors with importance percentages
Recommendations Panel - Provides personalized care recommendations based on risk level
Navigation System - All 5 tabs working (Dashboard, Patient Assessment, Data Management, Model Performance, Risk Predictions)
Risk Segment Cards - Working in predictions tab showing patient distribution across risk levels
Predictions Table - Displays 100 patient predictions with visual risk probability bars
Feature Selection Interface - 15 interactive feature chips in Model Performance tab
Interactive Charts - Multiple chart types on dashboard (diagnosis risk, age groups, gender distribution, top diagnoses)
Sidebar Navigation - Collapsible healthcare-themed sidebar with status indicators
Data Management - Generate sample data and validation buttons working
Model Performance Cards - Model comparison interface with accuracy metrics
Real-time Assessment - Instant risk calculation and visualization upon form submission

success_percentage.backend: 100% (13/13 tests passed including all new enhanced features)
success_percentage.frontend: 95% (25/26 UI components and workflows functional - minor selector adjustments needed)
